name: logmagnifier
description: A powerful log analysis tool for Visual Studio Code, featuring advanced log filtering and diverse highlighting options.
author: webispy@gmail.com

logmagnifier.regexHighlightColor.description: Background color for Regex highlight. Can be a color string, a preset name (e.g. 'Red'), or an object with light/dark values.

logmagnifier.tempFilePrefix.description: Prefix for the filtered temp files.

logmagnifier.statusBarTimeout.description: Duration for status bar messages in milliseconds.

logmagnifier.enableRegexHighlight.description: Enable highlighting for Regex filters in the editor.

view/item/context.when: view == logmagnifier-filters && viewItem =~ /filterGroup.*/
view == logmagnifier-regex-filters && viewItem =~ /filterGroup.*/
(view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/)
viewItem =~ /filterGroup.*/ && (view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters)
(view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/)
(view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && viewItem == filterGroupDisabled
(view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && viewItem == filterGroupEnabled

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor1_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor2_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor3_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor4_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor5_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor6_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor7_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor8_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor9_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor10_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor11_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor12_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor13_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor14_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor15_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/ && viewItem =~ /.*_colcolor16_.*/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_hm0.*/ && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_hm1.*/ && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/

view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_hm2.*/ && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/
view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_cs0.*/
view == logmagnifier-filters && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && viewItem =~ /.*_cs1.*/
view == logmagnifier-filters && viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl0/ && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/
view == logmagnifier-filters && viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl3/ && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/
view == logmagnifier-filters && viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl5/ && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/
view == logmagnifier-filters && viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl9/ && viewItem =~ /.*_typeinclude/
(viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItem(Enabled|Disabled)_cl.*/) && (view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters)
(view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && (viewItem == filterItemDisabled || viewItem =~ /filterItemDisabled_cl.*/)
(view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && (viewItem == filterItemEnabled || viewItem =~ /filterItemEnabled_cl.*/)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
